name: meetingPollCreate
description:
Polls allow the meeting host to survey attendees. Use this API to create a [poll](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/213756303-Polling-for-Meetings) for a meeting.

**Scopes**: `meeting:write:admin` `meeting:write`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
**Prerequisites**:
* Host user type must be **Pro** or higher plan. * Polling feature must be enabled in the host's account. * Meeting must be a scheduled meeting. Instant meetings do not have polling features enabled.

meetingId.description:
The meeting ID in **long** format. The data type of this field is "long"(represented as int64 in JSON).

While storing it in your database, store it as a **long** data type and **not as an integer**, as the Meeting IDs can be longer than 10 digits.

name.description: Question to be asked to the attendees.

type.description:
Poll Question & Answer type:
`single` - Single choice
`mutliple` - Multiple choice

$ul:
**status**: Status of the Meeting Poll:
`notstart` - Poll not started
`started` - Poll started
`ended` - Poll ended
`sharing` - Sharing poll results
